channel.title: Why must i leave my ip address blank to connect help!
channel.description: help when i enter my server nAME IT can't find it i have portforward properly whats the porlbme evertinng is right to connect to my server i have to leave ip address blank why is that

item.title: Why must i leave my ip address blank to connect help!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

You are connecting with nothing in the the IP box because your client is set to connect to localhost (127.0.0.1) by default for your own convieniece. Whatever you do if your running the server and want to play this will be the same. Only other people playing your server will have to enter your IP address or DNS redirect.

Read full topic
item.source: Why must i leave my ip address blank to connect help!

item.title: Why must i leave my ip address blank to connect help!
item.dc:creator: @Zh1 Zh
item.description:
@Zh1 wrote:

Well, I’ll try to answer your question, considering you can’t spell worth shit, I might be wrong. I think your asking why can’t you connect when you enter your server IP Address? It’s because if you’re hosting it, You have to connect with localhost/127.0.0.1 Because you’re hosting it from your IP Address. So try connecting with 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
item.source: Why must i leave my ip address blank to connect help!

item.title: Why must i leave my ip address blank to connect help!
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Try 0.0.0.0 as well. Also, you have to have a No-IP account and the DUC downloaded.
